name: The Great Adventure (LiamBellAut)
description:
In The Great Adventure you play as Sir Edmund Hilary and your goal is to reach the South Pole without running Out of resources.

Controls.

You can use WASD or the arrow keys to move your character 

Esc will send you back to the start screen. 

For the best experience play on a 1080p screen and click the blue full screen button on the lower right of the screen .

Have fun.
